item.title: Trump to announce 25% steel and aluminum tariffs in latest trade escalation
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday that he will announce on Monday new 25% tariffs on all steel and aluminum imports into the U.S.

item.title: Consumer Financial Protection Bureau staff told to work remotely as headquarters is shuttered
item.description: CFPB employees were told Sunday to work remotely because their Washington, D.C., headquarters would be closed through Feb. 14, according to a memo.

item.title: Musk calls to impeach judge whose order blocks DOGE from Treasury systems access
item.description: Musk wants to impeach a federal judge after an order temporarily restricts his team from accessing the Treasury Department's payment systems and sensi...

item.title: Egypt announces emergency Arab summit after Trump's Gaza plan infuriates key allies
item.description: Trump's suggestion infuriated the Arab world, including Egypt, Jordan and Saudi Arabia â€” key allies of Washington.

item.title: Hamas frees three hostages as Israel begins releasing Palestinians
item.description: Palestinian militant group Hamas handed over three Israeli hostages on Saturday, whose gaunt appearance shocked Israelis.
